DATE_FORMAT / STRFTIME (python/sqlite)


%F 		ISO 8601 date: YYYY-MM-DD
    %Y 		year: 0000-9999
    %m 		month: 01-12
    %d 		day of month: 01-31


%T 		ISO 8601 time: HH:MM:SS
    %H 		hour: 00-24
    %M 		minute: 00-59
    %S 		seconds: 00-59
